This websites shows the demo presentation from <https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/revealjs/> with an example for each available theme.

## Why this website ?

- Discover what a theme looks like. 

- Easier control when we update themes. 

Navigate the menu or scroll below

::: {.callout-note}

## Quarto version

This page was rendered using Quarto version {{< var quarto_version_main >}}, like one of each themed presentations. Other presentations where rendered using {{< var quarto_version_other >}}
:::

## Revealjs Themed presentations

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
main_output_path <- "revealjs-themed"
files <- fs::dir_ls(main_output_path, recurse = TRUE, glob = "*/index.html")
theme <- fs::dir_ls(main_output_path) |> gsub(pattern = "revealjs-themed/revealjs-", replacement = "", fixed = TRUE)
files2 <- fs::path(glue::glue("{main_output_path}-2"), glue::glue("revealjs-{theme}"), "index.html")
stopifnot(
  fs::dir_ls(glue::glue("{main_output_path}-2"), recurse = TRUE, glob = "*/index.html") == files2
)
glue::glue("
### Theme %%glue::single_quote(theme)%% {.theme-example}

#### Using Quarto {{< var quarto_version_main >}}

::: {.slide-container}
`<iframe class='slide-deck' src=%%glue::double_quote(files)%% height=300px></iframe>`{=html}
:::

`<p><i class='bi bi-display' role='img'></i><a href=%%glue::double_quote(files)%% target='_blank'>View %%fs::path_file(fs::path_dir(files))%% in full screen</a></p>`{=html}

#### Using Quarto {{< var quarto_version_other >}}

::: {.slide-container}
`<iframe class='slide-deck' src=%%glue::double_quote(files2)%% height=300px></iframe>`{=html}
:::

`<p><i class='bi bi-display' role='img'></i><a href=%%glue::double_quote(files2)%% target='_blank'>View %%fs::path_file(fs::path_dir(files2))%% in full screen</a></p>`{=html}

", .open = "%%", .close = "%%")
```
